author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [Markdig.Signed](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig) from 0.18.3 to 0.20.0.
Changelog

Sourced from Markdig.Signed's changelog.

0.20.0 (18 Apr 2020)

  • Markdig is now compatible only with NETStandard 2.0, NETStandard 2.1, NETCoreApp 2.1 and NETCoreApp 3.1.
  • Many performance improvements from [PR #416](lunet-io/markdig#416) [PR #417](lunet-io/markdig#417) [PR #418](lunet-io/markdig#418) [PR #421](lunet-io/markdig#421) [PR #422](lunet-io/markdig#422) [PR #410](lunet-io/markdig#410)
Commits
  • 3ef1d73 Bump to 0.20.0
  • 47c6c49 Merge pull request #417 from KrisVandermotten/StringBuilderCache
  • a19f783 merged from master
  • edb4c6c Merge pull request #422 from KrisVandermotten/ListBlockParser
  • 4b6d7c7 Merge pull request #421 from KrisVandermotten/ParagraphBlockParser
  • 0386cfd Merge pull request #418 from KrisVandermotten/CodeInlineParser
  • 5c52a72 Merge pull request #416 from MihaZupan/new
  • 14fb550 Merge branch 'master' into StringBuilderCache
  • 741d09a Merge branch 'master' into CodeInlineParser
  • 34d9fa2 Merge branch 'master' into ParagraphBlockParser
  • Additional commits viewable in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=Markdig.Signed&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=0.18.3&new-version=0.20.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score/?dependency-name=Markdig.Signed&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=0.18.3&new-version=0.20.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired)
